General.Name: Sany Heavy Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Sany Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of construction machinery in Asia, Australia, Europe, North America, South America, Africa, and internationally. The company operates through six segments: Concrete Machinery, Excavation Machinery, Hoisting Machinery, Pile-Working Machinery, Pavement Machinery, and Financial Service. The Concrete Machinery segment research, develops, produces, and sells products, such as concrete pump trucks, concrete delivering pumps, concrete mixing stations, concrete mixer trucks, and concrete trucks. The Excavation Machinery segment research, develops, produces, and sells large, medium, and small excavators, and other excavators. The Hoisting Machinery segment research, develops, produces, and sells truck cranes, all-terrain truck cranes, crawler and tower cranes, and other hoisting machinery products. The Pile Machinery segment research, develops, produces, and sells products, such as rotary drilling rigs, electro-hydraulic pile drivers, and diaphragm wall grabs. The Pavement Machinery segment develops, produces, and sells road machinery product including road rollers, graders, pavers, milling machines, asphalt mixing plants, etc. The Financial Service segment offers mortgage loans and financial leasing services, as well as interbank lending services by financial institutions. Sany Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, China.
